auth.tagline: Digital tool for your housing company
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.inviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the invite code you received to register as a housing company representative.
auth.inviteCodeMinLength: Invite code must be at least 6 characters
auth.residentInviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the resident invite code you received from your housing company
auth.residentInviteCodeMinLength: Resident invite code must be at least 8 characters
auth.selectInviteTypeSubtitle: Are you a resident or housing company?
auth.residentRegistrationComplete: Welcome to TaloFix! You can now log in.
auth.orJoinWithCode: Or register with an invite code
auth.registrationCompleteMessage: Your account has been created successfully! You can now log in.
auth.welcomeHousingCompany: Welcome {{name}}! You can now log in.

admin.createCompanySubtitle: Fill in the housing company details. The company will register using an invite code.
admin.noCompanies: No housing companies. Create your first company to get started.
admin.noInviteCode: No invite code. Generate a code to share with the housing company.
admin.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register.
admin.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
admin.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the housing company representative.
admin.companyCreatedSuccess: Housing company created! Generate an invite code and share it with the company.
admin.deleteCompanyWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this company?
admin.deleteCompanyMessage: This action will permanently delete the housing company. This cannot be undone.

dashboard.title: My Page
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to TaloFix
dashboard.welcomeMessage: From here you can report faults in your apartment and track the status of your fault reports.
dashboard.name: Name

dashboard.title: Housing Company Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to TaloFix
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Housing company management view is coming soon. From here you can manage fault reports, announcements and residents.

residents.title: Residents
residents.createInviteSubtitle: Create an invite code for a resident. Enter building and apartment number.
residents.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the resident.
residents.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register as a resident.
residents.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
residents.noInviteCodes: No invite codes. Create an invite code to invite a resident.
residents.noBuildings: No buildings. Create an invite code to add residents.
residents.deleteInviteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this apartment?
residents.deleteInviteMessage: This action will permanently delete the apartment and all related data. If a resident has registered for this apartment, their account and fault reports will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
